price: 26 laissant un arrière-goût de musc - que ceux qui aspirent à cette félicité rivalisent donc de piété -
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
